attributes.action: Abolish the present House of Lords.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At the same time as abolishing the present House of Lords to also replace it with people who would be elected by lot. Such a lottery to take place at each General Election whereby everyone entitled to vote at a General Election would also  be entered into the Lottery. People can decline to be entered into the Lottery if they so wish. An agreed number of tickets (e.g. 650) to be used. Those people who have their tickets drawn can then serve in the House of Lords, in much the same way as happens in the present system, for the same duration as the Government serves its office until the next General Election. Their salaries to be the same as MPs. At the next General Election when the members of the House of Lords step down they will be paid a pension, starting immediately, for the rest of their lives, and for the pension to be equal to four times the state pension and tax free.
